alert.note: Alert for Marathon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 11:36PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Marathon County through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1136 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles west of Mosinee, or 15 miles southwest of Wausau, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wausau, Rib Mountain, Mosinee, Rothschild, Marathon City, Edgar, Evergreen, Fenwood, Halder and Rib Mountain State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
